channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Measure, Manage and Maximise Your Impact - A Guide for the Social Economy
item.description: Measure, Manage and Maximise Your Impact - A Guide for the Social Economy by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities has an embargo on Monday 15 April 2024 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities

item.title: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Slovak Republic 2024
item.description: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Slovak Republic 2024 by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Thursday 18 April 2024 at 10:00.

item.title: Steering from the Centre of Government in Times of Complexity - Compendium of Practices
item.description: Steering from the Centre of Government in Times of Complexity - Compendium of Practices by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Friday 19 April 2024 at 9:00.

item.description: Strengthening Transparency and Integrity of Foreign Influence Activities in France - A Tool for Combatting Foreign Interference Risks by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Monday 22 April 2024 at 14:00.

item.description: OECD Economic Outlook, Volume 2024 Issue 1 - Preliminary version by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 2 May 2024 at 9:00.
